name: Sleeper Lake
description:
Sleeper Lake is a Horror game for those who are 13+ as it contains mild language.

This project to tie into Halloween was made with the use of RPG Maker. This is my first attempt of making a game of this type, so criticism is more then welcome!

Everything is also in a black/white filter to make it feel like a old movie/dos game.

"Three friends go on a week long camping vacation together, but things start to go wrong and they quickly learn that they may not be alone..."

In this adventure, you can find up to 12 different endings. There are also different pathways you can take that will affect how the story unfolds. Will you decide to tell the truth? Will you decide to lie? What will the fate of the three campers be? 

Connor: Connor is the main protagonist who decided to get roped into this trip.

Alex: Alex is the anxious guy. He can be annoying at times, but he is also very caring about his friends. He is quick to anger and quick to forgive.

Kevin: Kevin is the reason for the trip to Sleeper Lake being possible. He owns a fancy car and also has temperamental issues, but he always comes through in the end. 

Ann & Lester: Ann & Lester are the owners of the farm house that Connor, Alex, and Kevin are camping at. They come from Kevin's family tree who ended up disappearing without a single trace of them. What happened to the couple? Will the mystery behind their disappearance finally be solved after all these years?
